'Fresh' is the fourth studio album by Teddybears STHLM. It was released in 2004
by Epic Records. In 2005 Fresh was re-released by Sony Records, dropping the
last song "Alma" of the track listing.

The album has been released with two alternative covers: one depicting the band
members with a white backdrop along with the band name and one with album title
and band name with a black background.
